ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s Kaiju vs. the KISS Army in a metal death match orchestrated by the mysterious ship the Obayashi. Will the last of humankind destroy themselves, or can the language of music save everyone?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Kyle Strahm | 1 | B | Cover B | Charles Wilson III | 2 | C | Cover C | Photo | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Kyle Strahm | 4 | E/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Charles Wilson III | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 6 |
